title: Find LCD
text: The least common denominator of $$\frac{b}{b-16}$$ and $$\frac{11}{9}$$ is 9(b-16).

title: Multiply LCD Both Sides
text: Through multiplying both sides by LCD, we get $$9b=11(b-16)$$.

title: Isolate b on One side
text: We can further simplify $$9b=11(b-16)$$ to $$9b=11b-176$$. By subtracting 11b both sides, we get $$-2b=-176$$. Then we divide by -2 both sides of the equation and get $$b=88$$ as the final answer.
